channel.title: Gems on Glogger
channel.description: Recent content in Gems on Glogger

item.title: Articles
item.description: Schema Evolution | Martin Kleppmann DLL and SOs with Go Ten useful techniques in Go Intro to SOA and Microservices Context Managers(python) Celery Pools Nameko (interesting way to build microservices in python) Go-Kit Micro (Go microservices ecosystem) S3 and Athena Django, Websockets, and Channels Wish I knew before building that app Chernobyl DevOps (Has a very deep insight on Chernobyl Disaster) Hydra (A JS microservices framework on top of Redis) A silent meeting is worth a thousand words Majestic Monolith AsyncIO vs green threads FastAPI Art of destroying software Your server as a function Big ball of mud
